article_title: Couple killed by Hezbollah rocket fire in northern Israel
sentence: Couple  killed  by  Hezbollah  rocket  fire  in  northern  Israel  T-I-T-L-E-E-N-D.

article_title: Couple killed by Hezbollah rocket fire in northern Israel
sentence: Two  civilians  have  been  killed  and  several  others  wounded  after  the  Lebanese  armed  group  Hezbollah  fired  at  least  150  rockets  into  northern  Israel.

article_title: Couple killed by Hezbollah rocket fire in northern Israel
sentence: These  were  the  first  Israeli  civilians  killed  by  Hezbollah  since  the  conflict  escalated  two  weeks  ago,  when  Israel  launched  an  intense  air  campaign  targeting  the  Iran-backed  group  before  invading  southern  Lebanon.
